text: Evergreen is an unincorporated community in Gallia County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Evergreen was platted in 1855. A post office called Evergreen was established in 1880, and remained in operation until 1927. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Gallia County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Evergreen, Ohio
